document.full_text: france is open to talking with any muslim movement abroad that renounces violence, foreign minister alain juppe said on tuesday, signaling a policy shift in the face of popular revolts across the middle east.
document.title: france signals new openness on muslim groups abroad
lines_and_colors: france is open to talking with any muslim movement abroad that renounces violence, foreign minister alain juppe said on tuesday, signaling a policy shift in the face of popular revolts across the middle east.
